UKFilmNews.com http://ukfilmnews.com UKFilmNews.com Tue, 13 Feb 2018 19:35:35 +0000 en-GB hourly 1 http://ukfilmnews.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/cropped-UKFN-Logo-1-32x32.jpg UKFilmNews.com http://ukfilmnews.com 32 32 THE GUERNSEY LITERARY & POTATO PEEL PIE SOCIETY – Official Trailer – Starring Lily James http://ukfilmnews.com/the-guernsey-literary-potato-peel-pie-society-official-trailer-starring-lily-james/ Tue, 13 Feb 2018 19:35:35 +0000 http://ukfilmnews.com/?p=2739 IN CINEMAS 20TH APRIL 2018

STARRING

LILY JAMES, MICHIEL HUISMAN, JESSICA BROWN FINDLAY, MATTHEW GOODE, KATHERINE PARKINSON, TOM COURTENAY and PENELOPE WILTON

The first trailer for THE GUERNSEY LITERARY AND POTATO PEEL PIE SOCIETY. Directed by Mike Newell (Four Weddings and a Funeral, Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire) and based on Mary Ann Shaffer and Annie Barrows’ best-selling novel, THE GUERNSEY LITERARY AND POTATO PEEL PIE SOCIETY comes to cinemas on 20th April 2018.

Lily James plays free-spirited journalist Juliet Ashton, who forms a life-changing bond with the delightful and eccentric Guernsey Literary and Potato Peel Pie Society, when she decides to write about the book club they formed during the occupation of Guernsey in WWII.

Directed by Mike Newell, the film also stars Glen Powell (Everybody Wants Some, Hidden Figures), Matthew Goode (The Imitation Game, Downton Abbey), Jessica Brown Findlay (Victor Frankenstein, Downton Abbey) and Katherine Parkinson (The IT Crowd, The Boat That Rocked) with Tom Courtenay (45 Years, Doctor Zhivago) and Penelope Wilton (The BFG, The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel).

]]> Matt Smith to play Charles Manson http://ukfilmnews.com/matt-smith-to-play-charles-manson/ Fri, 09 Feb 2018 19:18:45 +0000 http://ukfilmnews.com/?p=2735 Matt Smith,Suki Waterhouse,Hannah Murray & Odessa Young, will star in “CHARLIE SAYS” based on the story of three women sentenced to death as part of the Charles Manson cult murders. Smith will play Manson. Mary Harron will direct with filming due this spring in Los Angeles.

]]> THE CLOVERFIELD PARADOX – Trailer – Netflix http://ukfilmnews.com/the-cloverfield-paradox-trailer-netflix/ Fri, 09 Feb 2018 19:01:54 +0000 http://ukfilmnews.com/?p=2731 Directed by: Julius Onah
Produced by: J.J. Abrams, p.g.a. and Lindsey Weber, p.g.a.
Story by: Oren Uziel and Doug Jung
Screenplay by: Oren Uziel

Starring: Daniel Brühl, Roger Davies, Elizabeth Debicki, Aksel Hennie, Gugu Mbatha-Raw, Chris O’Dowd, John Ortiz, David Oyelowo, and Zhang Ziyi

About the film

In the near future, a group of international astronauts on a
space station are working to solve a massive energy crisis on Earth. The
experimental technology aboard the station has an unexpected result, leaving
the team isolated and fighting for their survival.

]]> Marvel’s Jessica Jones – Season 2 | Official Trailer http://ukfilmnews.com/marvels-jessica-jones-season-2-official-trailer/ Wed, 07 Feb 2018 17:03:12 +0000 http://ukfilmnews.com/?p=2712 Jessica Jones is back as New York City’s tough-as-nails private investigator. ]]> Mission: Impossible – Fallout (2018) – Official Trailer http://ukfilmnews.com/mission-impossible-fallout-2018-official-trailer/ Tue, 06 Feb 2018 17:41:08 +0000 http://ukfilmnews.com/?p=2708 The best intentions often come back to haunt you. MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE – FALLOUT finds Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) and his IMF team (Alec Baldwin, Simon Pegg, Ving Rhames) along with some familiar allies (Rebecca Ferguson, Michelle Monaghan) in a race against time after a mission gone wrong. Henry Cavill, Angela Bassett, and Vanessa Kirby also join the dynamic cast with filmmaker Christopher McQuarrie returning to the helm. Out on JUly 27th.

]]> Skyscraper – Official Trailer http://ukfilmnews.com/skyscraper-official-trailer/ Tue, 06 Feb 2018 17:36:26 +0000 http://ukfilmnews.com/?p=2704 Global icon Dwayne Johnson leads the cast of Legendary’s Skyscraper as former FBI Hostage Rescue Team leader and U.S. war veteran Will Sawyer, who now assesses security for skyscrapers. On assignment in China he finds the tallest, safest building in the world suddenly ablaze, and he’s been framed for it. A wanted man on the run, Will must find those responsible, clear his name and somehow rescue his family who is trapped inside the building…above the fire line.

Written and directed by Rawson Marshall Thurber (Central Intelligence, We’re the Millers), the 3D action-thriller is produced by Beau Flynn (San Andreas, Baywatch), Johnson, Thurber and Hiram Garcia (San Andreas, Central Intelligence).

]]> “Angel of Mine” – Noomi Rapace http://ukfilmnews.com/angel-of-mine-noomi-rapace/ Tue, 06 Feb 2018 17:31:27 +0000 http://ukfilmnews.com/?p=2700 Noomi Rapace will star as ‘Lizzie’ in the drama “Angel of Mine” which will be directed by Kim Farrant. The Melbourne set film tells the story of a woman close to madness after she loses her daughter and becomes convinced that another woman’s child is her own. Production is due to begin this spring/summer. The script is by Luke Davies & David Regal and is backed by Screen Australia . Su Armstrong, Brian R. Etting and Josh Etting of Garlin Pictures will produce with Nadine de Barros and Robert Ogden Barnum of Fortitude International acting as executive producers. It’s based on the 2008 French film “L’Empreinte De L’Ange”.
